Record.ClassificationPath: Mental Disorders/Mental Disorders Diagnosed in Childhood/Child Development Disorders, Pervasive
Record.Description: Severe distortions in the development of many basic psychological functions that are not normal for any stage in development. These distortions are manifested in sustained social impairment, speech abnormalities, and peculiar motor movements.Wide continuum of associated cognitive and neurobehavioral disorders, including, but not limited to, three core-defining features: impairments in socialization, impairments in verbal and nonverbal communication, and restricted and repetitive patterns of behaviors. (DSM, 1994)
